1000000001.sourceString: Source: This emblem can be collected by redemption with a free code. Inspect this item in "Collections" to see its code.

1000000002.sourceString: Source: Reward for donations to charity fundraisers.

1000000003.sourceString: Source: Awarded to veteran profiles imported from Destiny 1.

1000000004.sourceString: Source: Awarded to players whose art is featured by Bungie. Also known as AOTW (art of the week).

1000000005.sourceString: Source: Awarded to players whose movie is featured by Bungie. Also known as MOTW (movie of the week).

1000000006.sourceString: Source: Awarded to players whose fashion is applauded by Bungie.

1000000008.sourceString: Source: Unlocked from a Twitch Drop.

1000000009.sourceString: Source: Given to select streamers for distribution.

1000000010.sourceString: Source: Defeat or carry to victory a Bungie bounty target.

1000000012.sourceString: Source: Unlocked with a Bungie Store purchase.

1000000013.sourceString: Source: Unlocked with a Prime Gaming subscription.

1000000046.sourceString: Source: Flawless chest completion in the Trials of Osiris Lighthouse.

1000000047.sourceString: Source: Awarded to players who participated in the Destiny 2 Beta.

2206233229.sourceString: Source: Find treaure using maps provided by Cayde-6.
